description: People showing signs of coronavirus should self-isolate for seven days, the Manx government says.
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man follows UK's 'self-isolation' rules
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man follows UK's 'self-isolation' rules - BBC News
maintext: Mr Ashford said: "We do believe now it is sensible to be proactive in the fact that anyone who is showing any form of symptoms in line with this should self-isolate for the seven days."
